page.title: 15The Children of Herm, page 1
page.content: My name is Michael Stenhouse, I live at La Forge and my Dad is the island engineer. He works in the pump, sewage and power house. My name is Hannah Heyworth. I live up the hill. My house is called the Manor.I have two dogs. My daddy works as the island manager. My sister Zoe comes to school too. My mummy was born on Herm. My granny and grandad are the tenants of Herm. I like to go for walks and play. My name is Karen Walder. I live next to the school. I have four people in my family. My brother David has just started school. Daddy's job is the head chef at the Hotel. The name of my house is Cherry Cottage. My best friend is Hannah.
